title: Bards creator
body: I would like to know who created bard and wrote his story.I think he is pretty awesome and I would like to talk to him if possible.

replies.body:
Hi Krokodaktil,

Bard was created by Champion team that includes a large number of Rioters. Rabid Llama was the principal game designer, Skeeziks was the principle concept artist, and Loping Cinder was the principal Narrative writer. The core team of three worked together to ensure gameplay, theme, story, and art worked in tandem to create the wondrous cosmic vagabond that you know and, I hope, love (I do). They were in turn supported by a bunch of ridiculously talented and dedicated folks from various disciplines who helped bring Bard to life.

It's staggering to see the team effort in making these champs day-to-day. It's a privilege you just reminded me of. Cheers, and thanks for the question!
